# AI Expert Position Assessment

We're excited to see how you approach the integration of AI technology in higher education. As an AI Expert at our university, you will play a key role in teaching lecturers about AI applications, developing AI-based tools, and supporting the implementation of AI solutions.

## Assessment Overview

For this round, you will:

1. Choose one of two assignments
2. Prepare a 30-minute presentation
3. Participate in a 10-minute Q&A session
4. Demonstrate your technical and educational expertise


## Questions?
If you have any questions about the assignments or require additional information, please contact us at [contact information].

Welcome to the second round of assessment for the AI Expert position at our university. We're excited to see how you approach the integration of AI technology in higher education.

## Overview
As an AI Expert at our university, you will play a key role in:
- Teaching lecturers about AI applications in education
- Developing AI-based tools for teaching and learning
- Supporting the implementation of AI solutions across departments

## Your Assessment Task
For this round, you will prepare and deliver a 30-minute presentation (followed by 10 minutes of Q&A) on one of two assignments:

1. **Teaching AI Development Workshop**  
   Design and present your approach for teaching lecturers how to create AI-powered educational tools.
   [Learn more about Assignment 1 →](assignments/assignment-1/index.qmd)

2. **Quality Control for AI-Generated Content**  
   Develop and present a system for ensuring the quality of AI-generated educational materials.
   [Learn more about Assignment 2 →](assignments/assignment-2/index.qmd)

## Resources
We provide the following materials to support your preparation:
- Python script for generating Anki flashcards (generate-anki-deck.py)
- Sample course materials for testing
- Access to OpenAI API

## Next Steps
1. Review both assignments in detail
2. Choose your preferred assignment
3. Inform us of your choice at least 2 days before your presentation
4. Prepare your 30-minute presentation

## Questions?
If you have any questions about the assignments or require additional information, please contact us at [contact information].
